extShortName.description: A shortened version of the name (should try to be no longer than 11 characters)

extDescription.message: Простые дигитальные часы в верхней панели браузера. Это ТОЛЬКО МИНУТЫ. Скачайте так же ЧАСЫ для полных, удобных и легко заметных часов в вашем браузере!
extDescription.description: A description of the extension, be sure to mention the need to install both extensions

optionsFor.description: Title for the Options page, this will be prefixed to the extension name, such as --[Options for] Just a Clock - The Minutes--

blackLabel.description: Label for when the clock numbers should be black

whiteLabel.description: Label for when the clock numbers should be white

whiteLabelClarification.description: Suggestion of when to use white numbers

saveButton.description: Label for the button to save the options

saveNotice.message: Настройки возымеют эффект в течении 6 секунд
saveNotice.description: Message to the user that changing any settings will take up to 6 seconds after the Save button is hit - (this is displayed next to the Save button)

saveStatus.description: Message to inform the user that the settings were successfully saved.
